item.description: The restaurant is Nu Cavu: http://www.nu-cavu.com/ I've been there several times and it's great! They serve Italian, Steak, Chicken, and Fish. At 120 NM, it's a bit further than most of our destinations but the scenery is beautiful. And what could be better than a nice relaxing scenic flight on a Saturday? It's just across the Hudson River, just north of Stewart International. Meet at the terminal at FIT at 11:15 AM for an 11:30 departure. Please post PIC and/or PAX and head count.

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: Fly to Kobelt Airport (N45) for Lunch.
